message.content: {"given_definition_quality":65,"better_definition":"student; a person who attends school to learn.","sentence":"学生在学校。","image_prompt":"A student (boy or girl) sitting at a simple desk in a basic classroom, listening attentively. The classroom and the student's clothes show slight wear, and outside the window the world is softly crumbling in an apocalyptic but animated style. Soft lighting, muted colors, gentle sense of decay, with textbooks on the desk and a chalkboard behind, animated in a soft apocalypse animation style.","sentence_translation":"The student is at school."}
